title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Nicholas Financial Inc

content.text: In 1987, Nicholas Financial Inc went public and had its initial public offering (IPO) on the stock market.
On June 15, 1994, Nicholas Financial Inc implemented a 2-for-1 stock split, doubling the number of outstanding shares.
On December 4, 1996, Nicholas Financial Inc executed another 2-for-1 stock split, further increasing the number of outstanding shares.
On August 18, 1999, Nicholas Financial Inc performed a 3-for-2 stock split, resulting in an increase in the number of outstanding shares.
On December 31, 2002, Nicholas Financial Inc implemented a 3-for-1 stock split, significantly increasing the number of outstanding shares.
On June 26, 2003, Nicholas Financial Inc executed a reverse stock split, consolidating four existing shares into one new share.
On November 29, 2005, Nicholas Financial Inc performed a 5-for-4 stock split, resulting in a moderate increase in the number of outstanding shares.
On December 1, 2006, Nicholas Financial Inc executed another 3-for-2 stock split, further increasing the number of outstanding shares.
